full_title: Ring of Fire by Social Distortion
title: Ring of Fire
lyrics:
11 ContributorsRing of Fire LyricsLove is a burning thing
And it makes a fiery ring
Bound by one desire
I fell into a, a ring of fire

I fell into a burnin' ring of fire
I went down down down
And the flames went higher
And it burn burn burns
That ring of fire
That ring of fire

The taste of love is sweet
When hearts like ours meet
I fell for ya, like a child
Oh, let the fire burn wild

I fell into a burnin' ring of fire
I went down down down
And the flames went higher
And it burns burn burns
That ring of fire
That ring of fire

Let it burn!

I went down down down
And the flames went higher
And it burns burn burns
That ring of fire
That ring of fire

When hearts like ours meet
I fell for ya, like a child
Oh, let the fire burn wild

I went down down down
And the flames went higher
And it burns burn burns
That ring of fire
That ring of fire

One more time!
